comments.body: Not a fan of `apps`, since lots of apps won't be pet sets.  `clustered` is too close to the `cluster` resource.
I think the idea is to get deployment,replica etc out of "extensions". Open to suggestion, apps is just something we came up with after ~10m of discussions, and no one really had anything better.

Yeah agree with desire to create its own group, I definitely want a
different name before we merge (will think hard on this).

On Sat, Apr 16, 2016 at 12:50 AM, Prashanth B notifications@github.com
wrote:
